about_the_game:
Rogue Tank is a chaotic 3D tank shooter with rogue-lite elements. Enter the arena with your trusty tank. It’s time to wreak havoc!

COMBINE DEADLY UPGRADES

Upgrade your tank as you defeat your enemies. Pick upgrades that fit your style of combat. However, choose carefully, as combining the right set of upgrades will turn your tank into an absolute force of destruction.

WIELD THE TOOLS OF DESTRUCTION

Bombard enemies with your turret, crash them into deadly arena traps, zap them with lightning, or burn them to a crisp. Destroy your enemies with a diverse set of tools as you dodge incoming attacks.

UNLOCK AND REPLAY

Unlock new weapons, upgrades, and arenas as you battle. Permanently upgrade your tank to become even stronger!
